Entries.Mon: Hey there! I'm helping Soren today.$1

Entries.Tue: Hey there! I'm helping Soren today.$1
Entries.Wed: Soren and I ate a bunch of waffles this morning for breakfast!$1#$e#Knowing him, we're gonna have Grampleton Orange Chicken for dinner.$0

Entries.Tue: *yawn* I'm super tired today. Soren and I stayed up late watching anime.$2

DuringMovie.Text: Oh no.... I feel bad for the little guy.$2

AfterMovie.Text: Deep down, I feel like trees have their own feelings just like the brave little sapling.$1

BeforeMovie.Text: I wonder if my hometown of Grampleton will be in the movie?$0

AfterMovie.Text: I want to take a boat to Prairie Island someday and explore every corner!$1

BeforeMovie.Text: There's a lot of hype surrounding this movie. I hope it's as good as people say.$0

DuringMovie.Script: /jump Scarlett/pause 400/playSound reward/message "Scarlett is sucked into the film!"

AfterMovie.Text: That movie was awesome! I'd honestly watch it again if I could!$1#$b#I bet Soren's already seen it, knowing him.$0

BeforeMovie.Text: I don't know much about this movie. I'm going in blind!$1

AfterMovie.Text: That movie was kinda boring.$2#$b#Thanks for taking me out though.$0

DuringMovie.Text: The music is kinda... strange? If you can even call it music.$7

AfterMovie.Text: That advertisement at the end was kinda weird.$7#$b#I thought we were seeing a 'real' movie...$2

BeforeMovie.Text: How did you know I liked scary movies?$1

AfterMovie.Text: I can't believe that was recorded near my hometown.$0#$b#It'll take more than that to frighten me!$1

BeforeMovie.Text: It's a lot warmer in here than outside.$1

AfterMovie.Text: Stardrops sound super delicious. I hope to try one someday.$0

BeforeMovie.Text: I love hearing the sound of fresh popcorn being made.$0
I can't believe they made a Prairie King movie... I hope it's good!

AfterMovie.Text: The movie was so so great! Thanks for taking me!$1

BeforeMovie.Text: I hope this movie is good! I think there's a cute character in it!$1
Would you judge me if I snuck in my own candy?$1
Hey, you! Thanks for inviting me, I love going to the movies.$1

AfterMovie.Text: There were some silly parts, but I liked it.$9

BeforeMovie.Text: I-I don't know about this one. I'm just here for the snacks.$1

AfterMovie.Text: I think I'd rate that a 5 out of 10.$0

Entries.ScarlettFarmhand: Hey there, farmer.$0#$b#Work has been pickin' up for me durin' the spring season so I hired a farmhand to, well, give me a hand on the farm!$1#$b#I believe her name is Scarlett - a friend of Soren's.$0#$e#I've been earnin' more income lately so I got the cash. Never thought I'd see the day where It'd be me doin' the hirin'.$0

Entries.summer_Mon4: I accidentally dropped one of my mother's fancy wines yesterday...$2#$b#Had to spend some of my allowance to buy another iridium-quality bottle at Blue Moon Vineyard from Soren.$6
Entries.fall_Wed: I'm going to visit Soren tomorrow at his vineyard.$3#$b#While I'm there, I'll pick up some more of his iridium-quality wine. It's one of my mother's favorites.$1
Entries.married_Sophia: Congratulations on your wedding, @. I wish both you and Soren a lifetime of happiness and cherished memories.$1
Entries.divorced_Sophia: How could you, @? Soren will never be the same after this. You broke his heart!$5#$e#%Victor is ignoring you.
Entries.Custom_JenkinsHouse_23_25: Soren and I are watching 'My Villain Academia' today. Should be interesting.$3
Entries.Custom_JenkinsHouse_31_11: I had fun watching anime with you, Soren.$3
Entries.Custom_JenkinsHouse_21_39: It was great hanging out with you, Soren.$1
Entries.BlueMoonVineyard: Quite the view of the Gem Sea. Soren has the best view in town.$1
Entries.spring_23: I wonder if Soren is bringing his special iridium-quality wine to the flower festival?$0#$e#I'm not that great at dancing.$2
Entries.winter_7: Ready to make the trek into the forest tomorrow for the ice fishing festival, @?$1#$e#I enjoy walking with everyone to Cindersap Forest.$1#$b#It gives me an opportunity to talk to Soren and Sam. I don't see them very often.$3
Entries.winter_24: I wonder who my secret gift giver is this year for the Feast of the Winter Star.$0#$e#I hope it's Soren!$1

I don't want to push this all on you so suddenly.$1#$b#We'll start organizing stuff tomorrow.$9"/pause 600/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/stopMusic/pause 1000/message "I'm helping Soren move boxes tomorrow in his house."/pause 1000/end dialogue Sophia "Ready to help me tomorrow?$1#$e#You're the best!$9"

Shouldn't we head over to the stage room now?$0"/pause 300/speak Sophia "Oh, you're right! I got super distracted. Let's go now!$15"/pause 500/faceDirection ScarlettCosplay 1 true/pause 300/faceDirection ScarlettCosplay 2 true/pause 300/move ScarlettCosplay 0 7 2 true/pause 275/move SophiaJPK 0 6 2 true/pause 300/move farmer 0 6 2 true/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp WizardCosplayer -50 -50/warp PirateCosplayer -50 -50/warp GaldoranGirlCosplayer -50 -50/warp TotemGuyCosplayer -50 -50/warp TrashGirlCosplayer -50 -50/warp AdventurerCosplayer -50 -50/warp RedWitchCosplayer -50 -50/warp LuauGirlCosplayer -50 -50/warp LuauGuyCosplayer -50 -50/warp ConcernedApeCosplayer -50 -50/warp QiBeanCosplayer -50 -50/warp GoblinCosplayer -50 -50/warp ArtGuy -50 -50/warp GreenShirtGirl -50 -50/warp DinoGuyCosplayer -50 -50/warp HappyShirtCosplayer -50 -50/warp Cassandra -50 -50/warp farmer -30 -30/warp SophiaJPK -9 -9/faceDirection SophiaJPK 2 true/faceDirection farmer 2 true/warp ScarlettCosplay -28 -28/faceDirection ScarlettCosplay 2 true/stopMusic/changeLocation Custom_ZCCC_Stage/AmbientLight 100 100 100/warp MainStageCosplayer 16 9/showFrame MainStageCosplayer 0 true/pause 750/speak Sophia "I'm so nervous... Wish me luck!$15"/pause 1500/playSound FlashShifter.StardewValleyExpandedCP_ZCCC_Applause/pause 1000/viewport 16 16 true/viewport move 0 -1 6000 true/pause 4000/textAboveHead MainStageCosplayer "Thank you everyone!"/pause 3000/faceDirection MainStageCosplayer 1 true/pause 300/faceDirection MainStageCosplayer 0 true/pause 500/advancedMove MainStageCosplayer false 0 -3/pause 2000/warp MainStageCosplayer -50 -50/pause 1000/stopMusic/message "Announcer: Our next contestant is from Stardew Valley, cosplaying the main character from Journey of the Prairie King! Give it up for Soren!"/pause 250/playSound FlashShifter.StardewValleyExpandedCP_ZCCC_Cheering/pause 1300/warp SophiaJPK 16 6/move SophiaJPK 0 3 2 true/pause 3000/showFrame SophiaJPK 19/playSound dwop/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 500/stopMusic/pause 1500/message "Soren's skit was amazing! Entries.1000020/z winter/f Gus 500/w sunny/t 600: fall_day_ambient/-500 -500/farmer 18 50 1 Gus 25 55 2/skippable/pause 500/viewport 24 55 clamp true/pause 250/move farmer 4 0 2/pause 350/emote farmer 8/pause 200/move farmer 0 5 1/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 500/move Gus 0 0 3/emote Gus 16/pause 500/speak Gus "Ah, hello, @!$0"/pause 1000/move Gus 0 0 2/pause 1250/speak Gus "The view of the Gem Sea is mighty incredible from this height!$1"/pause 1000/move Gus 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Gus "So, what brings you to Blue Moon Vineyard?$0"/pause 500/speak Gus "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 gus_event1#I came by to see if Soren was here.#$r -1 0 gus_event2#I'm on my way to the beach.#$r -1 0 gus_event3#Why are you up here?"/pause 1000/speak Gus "I bought five cases of premium iridium-quality wine from Soren.$1#$b#The saloon only had one bottle left. I thought it'd be a good idea to restock.$0"/pause 800/move Gus 0 0 0/pause 1000/speak Gus "Blue Moon Vineyard is one of the largest vineyards in the Ferngill Republic. It was first established many years ago, and has always had a great reputation.$1"/pause 1100/question fork0 "#I don't know that much about the Vineyard.#That's interesting. Good luck with your errands."/fork 1000020_Mystery/pause 500/move Gus 0 0 3/pause 650/speak Gus "Thank you, @! Have a great day. Stop by and try a glass of this vintage sometime!$1"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end
Entries.1000020_Mystery: pause 1000/move Gus 0 0 2/pause 1250/emote Gus 40/pause 300/speak Gus "Hmm... that's right. You don't know.$2"/pause 800/move Gus 0 0 3/pause 600/speak Gus "Something very tragic happened to Soren's parents. I was close to them. They were good people.$3#$b#Soren inherited the Vineyard, and he's been doing a great job. It's a lot of work for one person, though.$3#$b#He doesn't show up in town very often. Not since his parents were...$2"/pause 500/move Gus 0 0 2/pause 400/emote Gus 28/pause 850/question fork1 "#What happened to Soren's parents?#Sorry, Gus. I didn't mean to bring up bad memories."/fork 1000020_SophiasParents/pause 500/speak Gus "That's okay, @.#$b#I need to go stock the saloon for tonight...$2"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 700/end dialogue Gus "...Sorry if I seem out of it, @.$2#$b#I've been thinking about Soren and his parents lately.$2"
Entries.1000020_SophiasParents: pause 1000/speak Gus "Soren's parents were...$2"/pause 650/playMusic echos/pause 1250/speak Gus "They were killed in a terrible car accident...$2#$b#It happened on I-63Z, south of Zuzu City. You may have heard about it on the news. A number of people were hurt and killed.$2#$b#A Joja cargo truck caused the crash. It was overloaded with a shipment that well exceeded the weight limit the truck could handle.$2"/pause 300/emote Gus 28/pause 150/speak Gus "Soren was devastated when he heard the news...$2#$b#Stardew Valley is a small community. Robert and Alice's deaths impacted everyone. We all comforted Soren as best we could.$2#$b#I did everything I could to help him. I've known him since he was a child.$3"/pause 1000/move Gus 0 0 3/pause 750/move farmer 0 0 1/pause 300/stopMusic/pause 400/speak Gus "Soren is a little younger than you, but he's one of the strongest people I know.$3#$b#I'm pretty sure he gets that from his mother.$3"/pause 500/speak Gus "$q -1 null#(What should I say)#$r -1 0 gus_event4#That's a lot to take in.#$r -1 0 gus_event5#It was all because of Joja's negligence."/pause 800/move Gus 0 0 0/pause 1250/speak Gus "@, if you see Soren, don't tell him I told you about his parents.$3#$b#As you can imagine... it's a touchy subject for him.$2"/pause 1000/move Gus 0 0 3/pause 500/speak Gus "I need to get back to the Saloon to prepare some things before opening for the day.$3#$b#Drop by later if you want to.$3"/pause 1250/faceDirection Gus 1 true/pause 500/emote Gus 28/pause 200/move Gus 5 0 1 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/mail GusSophia/pause 700/friendship Gus 50/end dialogue Gus "...Sorry if I seem a bit out of it, @.$2#$b#I've just... been thinking about Soren and his parents lately.$2"

Entries.claireSaloon: I feel awful for that young man...$2#$e#I see him working a lot, but earning so little.$0

Entries.gus_event1: He was here a moment ago. He left to run some errands though.$0
Entries.gus_event4: I always make the effort to visit Soren when I have free time. He really appreciates it.$2
Entries.gus_event5: Hmm... that's why Soren hates Joja.$2#$b#He... blames them for the death of his parents.$2

Entries.GusSophia: Hi @,^^Just wanted to drop you a quick line to ask you not to mention what I told you to Soren. I trust you to be discreet. It's important we're on the same page. Looking forward to seeing you at the saloon soon.^^  -Gus[#]Be Discreet
Entries.SophiaThankYouLetter: Hey you,^^Thanks for helping me restore my parents' room. I couldn't have done it without you, especially with the heavy stuff! I know it's strange I packed everything up and moved it all back... I suppose it was a change of heart.^Enclosed is a bottle of my finest aged Blue Moon wine. Thanks, silly!^^  -Soren %item object  FlashShifter.StardewValleyExpandedCP_Aged_Blue_Moon_Wine 1 %%[#]Soren's Gift

Entries.SophiaHouse.3: You look in the fridge and find it stuffed with several bags of orange chicken. Soren must love this stuff.
Entries.SophiaHouse.17: This looks like EVA foam. Soren must be making some armor for cosplay.
Entries.SophiaHouse.20: Soren is working on an outfit with dark brown leather.
Entries.SophiaHouse.29: Soren takes good care of his plants.
Entries.SophiaHouse.31: Soren has an NVIDIA RIVA 128 graphics card.
Entries.SophiaHouse.45: Soren's bed has a cotton candy pink comforter.
Entries.SophiaCellar.4: Soren is making Blue Moon Vineyard's trademark iridium quality grape wine.
Entries.Town-Fair.42: Soren's displaying aged Blue Moon Vineyard wine.
Entries.SophiaParentsRoom.2: It's one of Soren's teddy bears.
Entries.SophiasSpouseRoom.5: Soren was watching a funny anime cat video on MeTube.
Entries.SophiasSpouseRoom.6: Soren's working on a new cosplay project.

Entries.Sophia_Objective_1_Text: Drop off fairy seeds at Soren's chest.

Entries.5407919/e 5515272: continue/-500 -500/Sophia -20 -20 0 farmer -20 -20 0/pause 1100/speak Sophia "Hey, you. Um. I just wanted to say I'm really grateful for my fairy garden. I love it so much!$1#$b#To pay you back, I contracted with a new sprinkler supplier. You can purchase new devices from my ledger now.$9"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/playSound reward/message "I can now purchase iridium sprinklers and nozzles from Soren's ledger in his cosplay room!"/pause 1000/end dialogue Sophia "The iridium sprinklers and nozzles are really expensive... but I'm selling them at cost.$0#$e#I know they'll help out with your farming work, silly.$1"

Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Sophia: Hey, silly...$1"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 350/speak Sophia "Thank you for always filling my days with joy and comforting me when I'm down.$1#$b#It's nice knowing there will always be someone there for me.$9"/pause 500/faceDirection Sophia 3/pause 300/speak Sophia "I love living this happy farmer's life with you.$4

Entries.spring_Fri8: You know, I've never really been interested in going to college.$0#$b#It's something my papa wants me to do. To get an 'education'...$2#$e#I'm more of a 'hands-on approach' type of gal.$1
Entries.GreenRainFinished: What was up with that weird weather? Soren said all sorts of weird things grew in the valley.$0
Entries.married_Sophia: Hey! I'm overjoyed for you and Soren. It's important he has someone like you in his life.$1
Entries.divorced_Sophia: What happened between you and Soren? He hasn't been the same since you two got divorced...$7
Entries.Mon4: Not gonna lie, I'm like low key jealous of Soren's cosplay room.$0#$e#My papa is kind enough to let me use his work bench in the garage for my projects.$1#$e#The sewing machine in my room was a handy down from a close family friend.$0#$b#It does the job!$1
Entries.winter_Sat2: I always try to make time in my schedule to visit Soren.$0#$e#I wished we lived by each other. Maybe when I save up enough money I can move to Stardew Valley.$0
Entries.winter_Sat8: One day, Soren visited and we had Grampleton orange chicken for dinner. He never had it before.$0#$b#He ate his entire plate in like two minutes!$1#$e#I offered him some of mine and he ate half of that.#$b#It's probably one of my favorite memories of him!$1
Entries.Custom_BlueMoonVineyard_27_33: Ready to get to work, Soren!?$1
Entries.Custom_SophiaHouse_15_24: That was a tough day, huh Soren?$1
Entries.Custom_SophiaHouse_5_22: Isn't Soren's cosplay room cool or what?$0

Entries.patio_Sophia: I'm really happy living here with you.$1#$e#%You pat Soren's head.#$e#!!!$9
Entries.OneKid_1: %kid1 laughs when I make funny noises and faces.$9#$e#I love how our home is always full of laughter!$8#$e#%You pat Soren on the head. He smiles at you.
Entries.fall_4: Today was the day my parents died...$6#$b#I-I was alone for so long that I forgot what it's like to have a family.$12#$e#Thanks for being here for me, today.$13#$e#%Soren is crying.#$e#%You hug Soren. He smiles at you.
Entries.fall_28: Brrr... it's so cold. Supposed to snow lots and lots tonight.$2#$b#The weather man said so on the television!$1#$e#You know, cuddling is a good way to get warm...$4#$e#%Soren has a glint in his eye.
Entries.winter_28: I'm sad the snow is leaving. I'll miss crunching when I walk in it.$2#$e#%You pat Soren on the head.
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: D-do you remember when you found me crying in the rain? I'm happy you were there that day...$2#$b#I'll always treasure that moment, @.$1#$e#%You pat Soren on the head. He smiles at you.
Entries.Good_3: H-hey, be careful down in the mines, okay? I can't imagine what I'd do if anything happened to you.$2#$e#%You tell Soren not to worry. He smiles at you.
Entries.Bad_0: @... do you still love me?$2#$e#...$2#$e#N-never mind. I just... feel really down today for some reason.$6#$e#%Soren turns away from you.
Entries.Bad_1: I-I had a bad dream last night about my parents.$6#$e#I'm okay. It's just something that happens from time to time.$6#$e#...$12#$e#%You hug Soren.
Entries.Bad_2: I have a doctors appointment soon...$2#$e#I don't wanna go.$6#$e#%You tell Soren everything will be okay.
Entries.Bad_5: Hey... I'm hanging out with Victor tomorrow.$0#$e#What will we be up to? None of your business.$3#$e#%Soren turns away from you.
Entries.Bad_7: S-sorry, @. Don't feel like talking right now.$2#$e#I said not now. Stop bugging me!$3#$e#%Soren is ignoring you.
Entries.Bad_8: D-do you think I'm too clingy?...$2#$e#...$2#$e#%You hug Soren and pat his head. He smiles at you.
Entries.Bad_9: I-I had trouble breathing this morning...$2#$b#I-I'm okay...$6#$e#%You hug Soren.

Entries.spouseRoom_Sophia: Do you think my little room is too pink?$0#$e#Hehe...$9#$e#%You hug Soren.

Entries.funReturn_Sophia: Yay! You're back!$9#$e#%You pat Soren on the head.

Entries.funLeave_Sophia: H-hey, be careful in the mines, okay? I can't imagine what I'd do if anything happened to you...$2#$e#%You tell Soren not to worry. He smiles at you.

Entries.Introduction: Eek! A stranger!$2#$e#W-wait. Aren't you @, the new farmer?$0#$b#S-sorry. I get a little nervous around people I haven't met before...$1#$b#My name is Soren. I'm the owner of Blue Moon Vineyard.$9#$e#Um... well, I'll see you around, I guess.$1
Entries.divorced: I...I think I'm happier by myself. I've never really been compatible with anyone.$2#$b#Th-thank you for helping me realize that.$6#$e#*sniff*...$12#$e#P-please leave...$7#$e#%Soren is crying.
Entries.breakUp: Y-you want to break up with me?$2#$b#Did I do something wrong?$6#$b#*sniff*... Okay. I see you've already made up your mind.$12#$e#P-please go away, @.$7#$e#%Soren is crying.
Entries.rejectNPCB: Um. No thanks.$2#$e#I said no!$3#$e#%Soren is ignoring you.
Entries.reject_two_heartA: Oh... I don't feel that way about you. S-sorry...$2#$e#Um. I said no, @.$3#$e#%Soren is now ignoring you.
Entries.marriedA: Wh-what? Aren't you already married?$3#$e#@. Stop.$2#$e#I said stop!$6#$e#... I-I'm going to tell your spouse if you keep trying.$3#$e#%Soren is ignoring you.
Entries.makeup_no: O-oh. Um. But...$2#$b#...$6#$e#%Soren doesn't want to talk anymore.
Entries.Mon2: ...$6#$e#%Soren is ignoring you. He looks sad.
Entries.Tue10: Um. How is your day, silly?$1#$e#Mine just got better because you're here!$9#$e#%You give Soren a kiss. He smiles at you.
Entries.Wed10: @, you look really cute today.$4#$e#%You hug Soren. He smiles at you.
Entries.Fri10: Do you ever get lonely on %farm Farm?$0#$e#Oh. Um. No reason why I asked that.$4#$e#%You pat Soren on his head. He smiles at you.
Entries.Sat6: Hey, you! Want to grab food at the saloon sometime?$9#$e#I can put a good word in with Gus.$1#$e#%Soren smiles at you.
Entries.Sat10: Hey, you! I just want to talk to you every day!$9#$e#Did that sound too clingy?$2#$e#%You hug Soren. He blushes.
Entries.summer_Mon: *sigh* I have no motivation today.$2#$b#Maybe I'll visit Haley and Emily?$0#$e#AHH! W-were you listening to me talk to myself!?$5#$e#%Soren looks shocked.
Entries.summer_Wed: ...$6#$e#%Soren is ignoring you. He looks sad.
Entries.summer_Thu: ...$6#$e#P-please leave me alone...$12#$e#%Soren turns away from you.
Entries.fall_4: This was the day it happened...$6#$e#...$12#$e#S-Sorry. I-I just need to be alone. I... hope you understand.$12#$e#%Soren gestures you to leave.
Entries.fall_Mon: Can you please just go away? I'm not having a great day.$2#$e#P-please?$6#$e#%Soren looks upset...
Entries.fall_Thu: *sniff*... Oh. Hi, @. H-how are you today?$6#$e#O-oh. Me? I-I'm okay.$6#$e#*sniff*...$12#$e#%Soren is crying.
Entries.fall_Sun: ...$6#$e#%Soren is ignoring you. He looks sad.
Entries.winter_Tue10: You're looking cute today, silly.$4#$e#*smooch*$9#$e#%You lock eyes with Soren. He turns away and blushes.
Entries.winter_Fri10: Wanna have a snowball fight sometime?$1#$b#I bet I'd win!$9#$e#%You explain to Soren there's no possible way he could win.#$e#Is that a challenge, silly?$4
Entries.winter_Sat10: I-I don't feel so good today.$2#$e#Huh?$0#$e#%You hug Soren.#$e#Th-thanks.$1#$b#You know, You really make me happy. Um. Maybe we could...$2#$e#Gah. Nevermind. It's nothing.$1#$e#%You hug Soren.

Entries.fall_10: That Soren boy at the vineyard took over after his parents-$0#$b#Ack, nothin'. You'll need to talk to him about it.$2#$e#You have a good day, ya hear?$0
Entries.winter_Wed: Ever tried that Blue Moon wine before? I'm not particularly fond of wine, but Soren does a good job makin' it.$0
